title: PESEdit.com 2014 Patch 4.0 + DLC 2.0
description:
PESEdit.com 2014 Patch 4.0 + DLC 2.0



*** NEW FEATURES PESEDIT.COM 2014 PATCH 4.0 ***
- New league: Liga Adelante with 18 full teams with all correct squads, kits, faces, lineups (AD AlcorcÃƒÂ³n, CÃƒÂ³rdoba CF, RC Deportivo La CoruÃƒÂ±a, SD Eibar, Girona FC, HÃƒÂ©rcules CF, UD Las Palmas, CD Lugo, RCD Mallorca, CD MirandÃƒÂ©s, Real Murcia, CD Numancia, Recreativo Huelva, CE Sabadell FC, Real Sporting GijÃƒÂ³n, CD Tenerife, and Real Zaragoza)
- New teams: Added 9 European teams with all correct squads, kits, faces, lineups (Red Bull Salzburg, Club Brugge, Standard de LiÃƒÂ¨ge, Ludogorets Razgrad, Lokomotiv Moscow, Besiktas JK, Trabzonspor, Dnipro Dnipropetrovsk, and Metalist Kharkiv)
Faces: around 50 new faces including Arda Turan, Aubameyang, Cristiano Ronaldo, Olic, Salah
- Stadiums: Signal Iduna Park (Borussia Dortmund) and Arena Nationala (Steaua Bucharest and Romania NT) Thanks to Iepure!
- Kits: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Montenegro, Netherlands, Northern Ireland, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Russia, Scotland, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey, Wales, Guinea, Mali, Morocco, Nigeria, Senegal, South Africa, Tunisia, Zambia, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Honduras, Jamaica, Panama, United States, Venezuela, Australia, China, Iran, Iraq, Jordan, Kuwait, Lebanon, New Zealand, North Korea, Oman, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, South Korea, UAE, Uzbekistan, AtlÃƒÂ©tico Madrid, FC Copenhagen, Stuttgart, Paderborn, Kaiserslautern, Nottingham
- Online: Reworked online switch: no crashes anymore, all team names and kits working online
- Boots: Adidas adizero f50 TRX Messi, adizero f50 Solar Slime, Mercurial Vapor IX 02
- Ball: Adidas Brazuca OMB
- Selector: Updated selector with new game settings tab (allows to change the game resolution and quality settings without restrictions)
- Other: Created missing players like Herrera (Elche), Nahuel (Villarreal) or Yalcin (Stuttgart)



*** GENERAL FEATURES PESEDIT.COM 2014 PATCH ***
- Full Online Mode compatibility
- Includes latest PES 2014 Patch 1.07 and Data Pack 3.00
- Added Bundesliga
- Added Liga Adelante, 2. Bundesliga and Sky Bet Championship
- Added 11 stadiums: Anfield, Arena Nationala, Camp Nou, La Rosaleda, Mestalla, Rose Park Stadium (generic), Santiago Bernabeu, Signal Iduna Park, Stadion (generic), Stamford Bridge, Vicente CalderÃƒÂ³n
- Updated 2014 winter transfers
- Corrected kits for all Premier League teams and all unlicensed National Teams
- Corrected boots, accesories, shirtname for 6000+ players
- Corrected fake national team player faces (1000+ faces!)
- Fixed team names and emblems for Premier League and Liga ZON Sagres teams
- Added 60+ new boots
- Corrected player names for unlicensed National Teams (Algeria, Bosnia, Japan, Netherlands, United States etc.)
- Fixed names and emblems for all competitions
- Fixed lineups for 50+ teams (Arsenal, Liverpool, Napoli etc.)



*** How to install ***
- See readme section, included in torrent, for further details
